title: Bachelor vet Tyler Cameron reveals he's still 'friends' with ex Gigi Hadid
text:
They were only together from August until they split in early October. But Bachelorette alum Tyler Cameron has revealed that he and Gigi Hadid are still friends.

The general contractor, 26, dished about dating a celebrity in a chat with Us Weekly at the grand opening of the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, Florida, on Thursday.

'It was just a different world… I never navigated it before,' admitted the part-time model. 'They are no different than anyone else.'

Scroll down for video

Blue to match his eyes: Bachelorette alum Tyler Cameron suited up for the grand opening of the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, Florida, on Thursday

And he and the model, 24, are in touch 'when we need to be. … We’re friends,' Tyler continued.

Fans were shocked to see him dating Gigi so soon after the show ended.

The hunky reality TV star was asked out for drinks by Bachelorette Hannah Brown, 25, during the season 15 finale after she split with winner Jed Wyatt, also 25.

Recent love: The 26-year-old revealed that he and model Gigi Hadid, 24, here seen heading out to an event in NYC earlier this month, are still friends after their whirlwind, three-month fling

Tyler was seen leaving her apartment in Los Angeles just days before he and Gigi got together.

They were hot and heavy for the next few weeks. He even provided moral support for Gigi at her grandmother's funeral in the Netherlands.

But their relationship wasn't to be.

Early date: Tyler and Gigi got together in August, and were seen leaving Justin Theroux's bar, Le Turtle in Manhattan, New York, the same month

A source told Us at the beginning of October, 'He and Gigi Hadid are no longer together. Tyler is single.'

Meanwhile, Tyler has no plans to date anyone else in the Bachelor Nation or, indeed, to appear in spin-off Bachelor In Paradise.

'It's just not something on my mind right now,' he said.

His pretty ex: He also talked to the site about Brown. Cameron has been watching the beauty compete on Dancing With The Stars and has even called in to vote for her. She is paired with her professional partner Alan Bersten

He also talked to the site about Brown. Cameron has been watching the beauty compete on Dancing With The Stars and has even called in to vote for her.

She is paired with her professional partner Alan Bersten.

'Of course I want her to win,' he told Us. 'She looks like she’s having a blast. It looks so much fun. She’s killing it.'

He joked about wanting to join DWTS too.

'They have not reached out to me yet … I’m waiting on that call,' he said. 'You’ve seen my moves on TV.'
description: The hunky general contractor, 26, dished about dating the celebrity in a chat with Us Weekly at the grand opening of the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, Florida, on Thursday.
